sentences.sContent: You have now added all of the required certificates.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have now added all of the required certificates.
sentences.sCn: 现在，您已经添加了所有必需的证书。

sentences.sContent: If you have a leaking tap, replace the washer or other components as required.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have a leaking tap, replace the washer or other components as required.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有一个漏水的龙头，更换垫圈或者其他需要的零件。

synos.tran: 需要（require的过去式及过去分词形式）；要求

phrases.pCn: 应具备单据；单据要求；所需要的单据
预期收益率，要求投资盈率；所需回报率，要求报酬率
